name: 何思慧　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: This course aims to increase students’ reading and writing abilities. A variety of reading, writing, and oral communication tasks are provided with a view to developing students' reading, writing, and oral communication skills. The course will be focusing on reading strategies, writing structures, vocabulary building, and grammar. Class activities include group discussion, class discussion, exams and so on. Students will be required to complete homework and express themselves in English.
